text: Al-Manar TV is a television station run by the Lebanese political group Hezbollah. It broadcasts from the city of Beirut, Lebanon. The station started on 4 June 1991 as a part of the Arab States Broadcasting Union. The United States said that the station is designated as a global terrorist organisation. It was banned on 17 December 2004. == References == Category:Hezbollah Category:Television stations Category:Beirut Category:1991 establishments in Asia
title: Al-Manar
